newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar ends easier, thin.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar ends easier, thin.

text.p: White sugar futures ended easier and at the lows on Wednesday after some late speculative selling in a listless market, traders said.
December was $1.30 lower at $312.90 and March, down by the same margin, last traded at $309.00. Volume reached a modest 2,164 lots picking up in late activity.
Technically, December and March are still moving downwards within a channel dating from reaction lows on September 17, despite the recent slight firmness.
Analysts also peg December support at $310.
